projects.name: AUTOMATED HR-INTERVIEW SYSTEM
projects.description: Developed an automated HR interview system using Big Five traits, improving candidate evaluation accuracy by 48% and reducing decision-making time by 42%.

projects.name: LUNANAV: DEEP LEARNING FOR LUNAR TERRAIN MAPPING AND NAVIGATION
projects.description: Achieved 98.5% accuracy in lunar terrain classification with DeepLabV3+ & Xception71 DPC based SOTA model, improving rover navigation efficiency.

experiences.description: Gained expertise in 7 key areas: Salesforce fundamentals, Apex, process automation, flows, LWC, API integration, and security.
Developed a project allocation system, boosting efficiency for 1,000+ students and 100+ faculty while cutting paperwork by 75% across 10+ Departments.
